translation: Zmanuk qsm (yymich grdsh ansan sndyn ḥalatn pytth gvah chhe).ya.ʿṣr nmazi hund qsm (zi so chhe sarine nmazn hund vsṭ).ya. ʿṣr kh vqtuk qsm (yymhi saʿth dohụ̄ dohs pzln vvl āftab panh losnuk mnẓr chuh pysh kran.) ya. Mṣṭfy (ṣly Allah ʿlyh vslm) sndi bʿtht kh zmanuk qsm (yus sarine zmann hund maḥṣl th mqṣvd chuh).
Be shk chuh ansan khsars mnz (zi suh chuh ttạtth ʿmr ravravan).

Timav lukv varạe yimav ayman aon byyhi rvudụ̄ nyk ʿml kran th (mʿāshrs mnz) rvudụ̄ aakh akis ḥquk tlqyn kran byyhi rvudụ̄ (ḥq kis tblygh kis ntyjh hs mnzpysh yinh valyn mṣybtn th mshklatn mnz) panh vạnụ̄ṣbruk takyd kran.
